snippet: Denver Broncos outside linebacker Von Miller was named the Most Valuable Player of Super Bowl 50 following his team's 24-10 triumph over the Carolina Panthers on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos outside linebacker Von Miller was named the Most Valuable Player of Super Bowl 50 following his team's 24-10 triumph over the Carolina Panthers on Sunday.

headline.main: Broncos' Von Miller Named MVP of Super Bowl 50
headline.print_headline: Broncos' Von Miller Named MVP of Super Bowl 50
